title: Hennge
description: HENNGE is a leading cloud-based security provider in Japan, delivering an additional security layer to companies that move their operations to the cloud. Our service HENNGE One has over 70% market share for cloud security services targeting Microsoft 365/Google Workspace in Japan. We are growing fast and are a listed company on the Tokyo Stock Exchange

positions.address: Daiwa Shibuya Square, 16-28 Nanpeidaicho, Shibuya City
